main event: A roundish, reddish-white object was observed moving in an arc and hovering over Hatchville, Massachusetts for about 50 minutes on August 13, 1980.
interesting points: The object had two exhaust flames and was tracked both visually and by radar.
The object made an angular climb to the north after hovering for about 10 minutes.
The observer was an unknown civilian, referred to as a housewife.
The weather conditions were good, with clear visibility and no storms in the area.
No known missile firings or radio/radar disturbances were reported that could be related to the sighting.
sighted object: A roundish, reddish-white object with two exhaust flames
witnesses: An unknown civilian, referred to as a 'housewife'
